ygData.subject: Re: Farewell party in Kelethin 7/23 11pm
ygData.msgSnippet: no! I was on vacation and the dumb flight was cancelled and I would have been there for the party but I wasn t and now I hear Gilerrin is leaving?! I sure hope
ygData.messageBody:
no! I was on vacation and the dumb flight was
cancelled and I would have been there for the party but I
wasn't and now I hear Gilerrin is leaving?! I sure hope
that he figures something out! Well, if not, I want to
help him with all he has done for this site and all
that he has helped me with in Norrath. It was always
nice to have a friend of identical class/race and at a
higher level to give pointers and good deals to a fellow
Ranger and many others as well =) <br><br>SAY IT AIN'T
SO!<br><br>Trellan Hawksight, Wood Elf Ranger of 20 seasons.
